The Spirit of Dominus Deus is upon me; because Dominus Deus hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the contrite of heart, to proclaim libertas to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;
To proclaim the acceptable year of Dominus Deus, and the day of vengeance of our Deus; to comfort all that mourn;

To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them a corona of beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the vestimentum of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planting of Dominus Deus, that he might be glorified.
And they shall build the old wastes, they shall raise up the former desolations, and they shall repair the waste cities, the desolations of many generations.
And strangers shall stand and feed your flocks, and the sons of the alien shall be your plowmen and your vinedressers.
But ye shall be named the Priests of Dominus Deus: men shall call you the Ministers of our Deus: ye shall eat the riches of the Gentiles, and in their glory shall ye boast yourselves.
For your shame ye shall have double; and for confusion they shall rejoice in their portion: therefore in their land they shall possess the double: everlasting joy shall be unto them.
For I Dominus Deus love judgment, I hate robbery for burnt offering; and I will direct their work in truth, and I will make an everlasting covenant with them.
And their seed shall be known among the Gentiles, and their offspring among the people: all that see them shall acknowledge them, that they are the seed which Dominus Deus hath blessed.

I will greatly rejoice in Dominus Deus, my soul shall be joyful in my Deus; for he hath clothed me with the vestimentum of salvation, he hath covered me with the vestimentum of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.

For as the terra shall bring forth her bud, and as the garden causeth the things that are sown in it to spring forth; so Dominus Deus will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth before all the nations.
